document.full_text: a default would have severe reverberations in global markets, a top federal reserve official said just hours after fitch ratings warned it could slash credit ratings if the government misses bond payments.
document.title: fed: default would be dangerous; fitch may cut rating
lines_and_colors: a default would have severe reverberations in global markets, a top federal reserve official said just hours after fitch ratings warned it could slash credit ratings if the government misses bond payments.
